trans-unit.source: Due to lack of resources, iOS is not supported, and it is unlikely that the app will run unchanged on that platform. However, being a hybrid app, it shouldn’t take too much effort to make it work, so please feel free to fork and give it a try!
trans-unit.target: 由于缺乏资源，因此不支持iOS ，并且该应用程序不太可能在该平台上运行。但是，作为一个混合应用程序，它不需要花费太多的精力就可以正常工作，因此请随意进行尝试！

trans-unit.source: If you’d like to see Mopidy Mobile in your native language, start by having a look at the existing translations. Mopidy Mobile uses angular-translate for internationalization, and stores translations as simple text files. Just take one of the existing files and replace all foreign language text as you see fit. Words within curly brackets
trans-unit.target: 如果您想用母语查看Mopidy Mobile，请先看一下现有翻译。Mopidy Mobile使用angular-translate进行国际化，并将翻译存储为简单的文本文件。只需采用现有文件之一，并替换所有适合您的外语文本即可。大括号内的单词

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: License
trans-unit.target: 许可证

trans-unit.source: Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0.
trans-unit.target: 根据Apache许可，版本2.0许可。

trans-unit.source: Mopidy Mobile is a simple, easy to use remote that lets you fully control a Mopidy music server from your mobile device. It is available as a Web client extension and a hybrid app for Android version 4.4 and later. Users of older Android versions may still access the Web extension using Google’s Chrome browser. On Apple devices, the Web client should work when running iOS 7 or later.
trans-unit.target: Mopidy Mobile是一个简单易用的遥控器，可让您从移动设备完全控制Mopidy音乐服务器。它可作为Web客户端扩展和 Android 4.4及更高版本的混合应用程序使用。使用旧版Android的用户仍可以使用Google的Chrome浏览器访问Web扩展。在Apple设备上，运行iOS 7或更高版本时，Web客户端应该可以工作。

trans-unit.source: Mopidy Mobile is built using Ionic v1, AngularJS and Apache Cordova, so it is recommended to familiarize yourself with these before you start.
trans-unit.target: Mopidy Mobile是使用Ionic v1，AngularJS和Apache Cordova构建的，因此建议您在开始之前熟悉它们。

trans-unit.source: Mopidy Mobile on $hostname
trans-unit.target: Mopidy Mobile on $hostname

trans-unit.source: Mopidy Web client extension for mobile devices
trans-unit.target: 移动设备的Mopidy Web客户端扩展

trans-unit.source: Note that the Web client is designed to be added to your home screen, so it is launched in full-screen “app mode”. If you don’t know how to add a Web application to your home screen, there are plenty of instructions available online for both Android and iOS.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，Web客户端旨在添加到您的主屏幕，因此它以全屏“应用程序模式”启动。如果您不知道如何在主屏幕上添加Web应用程序，则可以在线获取大量有关Android 和iOS的说明。

trans-unit.source: Please refer to the Ionic CLI documentation for further information on how to run the app on an actual device, or in a Web browser or emulator for testing.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅Ionic CLI 文档，以获取有关如何在实际设备上或在Web浏览器或仿真器中运行该应用程序进行测试的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Project Resources
trans-unit.target: 项目资源

trans-unit.target: 源代码

trans-unit.source: The Android app is available from the Google Play store. You may also join the Beta testing program to preview unreleased versions.
trans-unit.target: 可从Google Play 商店购买Android应用。您也可以加入Beta测试程序来预览未发布的版本。
